body.name: COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner, 5.07 fl.oz / 150ml | Exfoliating Facial Spray | Korean Skin Care, Hydrating, Mild Exfoliation, Vegan, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
features: Gentle Exfoliating Toner: Formulated with AHA, BHA, and Purifying Botanical Ingredients, our toner improves skin texture, skin vitality, and control pores.
Soothes, Refreshes & Softens Skin: 0.1% of AHA Glycolic Acid and BHA Betaine Salicylate helps remove dullness and dead skin cells.
Made with Natural Ingredients: 10% of Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water and Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Water, our mist type toner is gentle enough for daily use on all skin types.
Use as a Toner Mask: Saturate a cotton pad with the toner and use as a toner mask for immediate hydration.

COSRX Standards: All COSRX products are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients that alleviate irritated skin. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested, Animal Testing-FREE, Parabens-FREE, Sulfates-FREE, Phthalates-FRE
body.description: This treatment toner makes daily exfoliation possible with its mild AHA/BHA formulation. It mainly contains white willow extract and apple water which are abundant in nutrients beneficial to the skin. The gentle peeling process this clarifying toner offers makes it possible for the nutrients to effectively and fully penetrate the skin for optimum results. Over continuous usage, your skin will reveal a newer, healthier skin with a much smoother texture and brighter complexion. Directions : After washing your face, spray an appropriate volume of the toner onto a cotton pad. Gently sweep the damp cotton pad all over the face and pat it gently to allow better absorption. Net Wt. 5.07 fl. oz. / 150 mL

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Improves Dullness and Uneven Texture 10% of Pyrus malus (apple) fruit water and salix alba (willow) bark water enhance skin vitality and radiance 0.1% of AHA & BHA Care for your blackheads and whiteheads daily and gently before they get bigger and worse. It is mild enough to be used every day. Best Prep for Your Skin! The toner creates a clean base as an extension of your cleansing step and restores the ideal pH of the skin for any skincare products that follow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought this and a serum from this brand and I love it! There's no smell, it sprays on easy and wipes away just the same, and it doesn't burn my face. Highly recommend this if your looking for an exfoliating toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this product!!
reviews.reviewText: I use this toner 3-4x a week when i’m doing my entire exfoliating routine and it’s honesty a great toner this somewhat helped get rid of the bumps on my forehead along with the weird things on the side of my nose. Overall this is a good toner to use but I recommend using only 2 times a week for beginners because you can over exfoliate if you’re using more that just this product, & trust me it’s not that fun. But anyways this is a good product and is a staple in my skincare routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smoothens skin and minimizes the size of pores
reviews.reviewText: i love this toner and how soft it made my skin feel! even though the smell isn’t amazing it is tolerable and doesn’t smell bad. This toner is clear and a liquid, i recommend to use cotton pads and start using it once at night, if using in the day wear sunscreen because it does make ur skin sensitive to the sun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Acne Prone Skin
reviews.reviewText: i’ve always struggled with bad acne and when i got on BC, my acne worsened, especially my hormonal cystic acne. Not to mention i have fairly sensitive skin. I’ve tried countless face washes, toners, moisturizers, spot creams and NOTHING was working. i even changed my curology prescription. i’ve used the pimple patches from this brand and absolutely love them. When i had ordered them they came with a sample spot treatment. i gave it a try and it was one of the first spot treatments EVER that seemed to work almost overnight. that’s what led me to trying this toner.It’s lightweight (kinda just feels like water) and comes in a spray bottle which is amazing for easy application. i do a few sprays on my face and lightly rub it in w my fingertips to make sure my face is evenly coated and then let it air dry. and let me tell you this is by far my FAV toner i’ve ever used and i’ve only used it for abt a month or two. There’s no excessive stinging or drying out my skin and it helped with redness and inflammation just after 1 use. My cystic acne has started to clear up AMAZINGLY. i mostly only have slight hyperpigmentation (which it’s also helped with) from where pimples used to be but no current massive, active pimples on my face. if you’re thinking of trying this i would 100% recommend giving it a go. i just started using a few other products from this brand as well and so far so good :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for my night routine
reviews.reviewText: I love this product after switching from COSRX’s honey propolis toner. I use it at night and I would use it in the morning if I weren’t using a vitamin C serum then. This feels like it’s cleaning out my skin impurities, so I’ve really appreciated it. It is moisturizing/misty, and then soaks into your skin so your skin feels dry (but not in a bad way) afterwards, just moisturize as needed afterwards!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ... been a line that I have been falling in love recently. After trying out this product for over ...
reviews.reviewText: Cosrx has been a line that I have been falling in love recently. After trying out this product for over a month, I can safely say that this toner is not an exception. First thing first, the purging process takes a while. For me, it took me about over a month. Any pimples or bumps should go away within the day or a few. If not then maybe this product can't work for you but it did wonders on my skin. My skin now feels even better than before and as soft and smooth as a baby. I would highly recommend any of my friends and people I know about this product since it's so much more affordable than some of the high-end brands that I have tried in the past! This toner is my all time favorite along with the Klairs Supple Preparation Facial Toner and the Cosrx moisture pads (these last two are mostly for hydration)!Shipping was relatively fast since I have Prime and the packaging was in pristine shape. Nothing to complain about there.How I use this toner: I use this toner morning and night. In the morning, I like to spray it directly onto my face after I clean it since my skin tends to be more sensitive in the morning. I gently pat it in for a few mins until it is fully absorbed into my skin, I then proceed with my moisturizer and sunscreen. At night I double cleanse (BTW never dry your face with your towel, even if you're just tapping your face with the towel. There are many unknown and harmful bacteria that could have been attached to your towel so be careful! Personally, I like to just pat the excess water into my skin.). I then use a different hydrating toner on a cotton pad all over my face to remove any excess makeup or cleanser that remains. And of course to hydrate my face! Afterward, I take a different cotton pad and spray this clarifying toner on it, focusing it on areas that I tend to have clogged pores to help break down any oils that reside (Basically, almost my whole face). I proceed with my essence, treatments,serum, oil, and moisturizer.I hope this was somewhat helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure if this product is real or not but there are a lot of differences from the original package. The left is the original and right is the new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the line
reviews.reviewText: I have used many cosmetic and skin care lines. After being in the cosmetic industry for 15 years I have used and tried A LOT. I decided after much research to make the leap to a Korean line. WOW, what a differance it has made to my skin! I have turned my sister 52, sister in law 46, best friend 35 and me 58 in to lovers of this line!!TRY TRY TRY!!!!!
Super eficiente, mo irrita. Mi piel es mixta, así que es importante hidratar bien y usar bloqueador solar después de su aplicación.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for family member, would recommend as she has reordered it quite a few times. She says it does what it states and has worked wonders for her skin. Cosrx have great products and she is always purchasing them ! So far, so good !
This is my second bottle of the product and what I like about is it feels fresh and works well for skin texture.

E esperado unos días para escribir esta reseña unos 4 días porque quería probar la efectividad del producto y tengo que decir con lo poco que lo llevo usando que estoy encantada me a sorprendido mucho me a quitado en su totalidad puntos negros que tenía unos cuantos y los granitos (alguno me queda porque tenía un brote grande) asique cumple muy bien con su cometido, tambien decir que se absorbe super bien ya que habia leido a una persona que no se absorbia no hay que echar mucha cantidad para que haga su efecto, lo recomiendo mucho espero que esta reseña le sirva a alguien un saludo.
